subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: The former Olympic star Tim Montgomery has been indicted on heroin distribution charges weeks before he is to be sentenced in a scheme to cash millions of dollars in stolen or forged checks. Montgomery, 33, once dubbed the fasted human on Earth, was arrested Wednesday, accused of dealing more than 100 grams of heroin in Virginia over the past year. Montgomery’s former companion, the Olympic goal medalist Marion Jones, currently is serving a six-month prison term for lying to investigators about her role in the check scam and using performance-enhancing drugs.
